definition: Bushehr Province of south Iran, bordering on the Persian Gulf/Bushehr, port city, capital of Bushehr Province
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
ten (used in fractions, writing checks etc)/assorted/miscellaneous

pinyin: Xin1 Han3 bu4 shi2 er3 zhou1

sentences.english: More equal states, like New Hampshire and Minnesota, do far better.
sentences.chinese: 较平等的州，像是新罕布什尔州，情况则好很多。

sentences.english: Twilight descends in new Hampshire as an old man climbs onto his soapbox.
sentences.chinese: 暮色降临在新罕布什尔州的一个老头到他肥皂盒攀升。

sentences.english: And he holidays in New Hampshire. Not the Côte d'Azur, not the Dordogne but New Hampshire.
sentences.chinese: 他在美国新罕布什尔州度假。

sentences.english: St. Joseph Hospital, Nashua, New Hampshire.
sentences.chinese: 圣若瑟医院，新罕布什尔州纳舒厄。

sentences.english: Dwayne was an executive with a shoe manufacturer in New Hampshire.
sentences.chinese: 德韦恩是新罕布什尔州一家制鞋厂的经理。

sentences.english: As over Bushehr, Iran plays a long game.
sentences.chinese: 至于布什尔，伊朗可以说是放长线钓大鱼。

sentences.english: So I went to Philips Exeter Academy in New Hampshire,
sentences.chinese: 我去了新罕布什尔州的菲利普斯埃克塞特学院。

sentences.english: Iran's still-not-operational nuclear plant is in the southern Bushehr province.
sentences.chinese: 伊朗仍然没有经营的核电厂是在南部布什尔省。

sentences.english: The Bushehr plant, which has been under construction for many years, is now being loaded with fuel.
sentences.chinese: 已经建设了许多年的布什尔核电站目前正在装载燃料。

sentences.english: He currently resides in Portsmouth, New Hampshire.
sentences.chinese: 他目前居住美国新罕布什尔州朴次茅斯市。

pinyin: E2 ke4 la1 he2 ma3 zhou1
